Plot: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.
Title: The Darjeeling Limited
Writer: Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman
Actors: Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman, Amara Karan
tomatoConsensus: With the requisite combination of humor, sorrow and outstanding visuals, The Darjeeling Limited will satisfy Wes Anderson fans.
